link.script: $(document).ready(function () { var firstLoad = true; $('#datepicker').datepicker({ prevText: ' ', nextText: ' ', onSelect: function (dateText, inst) { if (!firstLoad) { var selected_date = new Date(dateText); var additional_url = 'date/' + selected_date.getFullYear() + '-' + (parseInt(selected_date.getMonth()) + 1) + '-' + selected_date.getDate() + '/view/day/';; var calendar_url = "https://www.rschoolpennsylvania.org/public/genie/1269/school/982/" + additional_url; window.open(calendar_url, 'Calendar', 'location=1,status=1,scrollbars=yes, width=1366,height=800,center=' + (screen.availHeight / 2 - 300) + ',center=' + (screen.availWidth / 2 - 300)); } firstLoad = false; } }); });

div.h1: Burrell School District Implements the Choose Love Program

img.alt: Image result for burrell school district choose love movement

div.p: Lewis told her powerful story and outlined her program, the Choose Love Enrichment Program, on Friday to a rapt audience of teachers, students, administrators and law enforcement at Burrell High School.
